announce.message: Darkness thickens. An evil presence grows in power, surpassing even Orshabaal! LEAVE Edron at once, mortals.
Morshabaal, the Lord of Shadows, is about to break into the mortal realm. Run while you still can!
Morshabaal, an entity more powerful than Orshabaal, has been summoned from the depths of hell to ravage the world of mortals.
